text:
Question 161) A patient needs intravenous rehydration made by five jars of serum for 24 h. Each bottle has a volume of 800 ml of serum. In the first four hours, it should receive 40% of the total to be applied. Each milliliter of serum corresponds to 12 drops.
The number of drops per minute the patient should receive after the first four hours will be
A) 16.
B) 20.
C) 24.
D) 34.
E) 40.
